lines.text: Trasgu: Very clever traveler you bested my tricks, but to be as clever as me you need to be as knowledgeable as me.

Trasgu: Luarca is a important fishing port and lies on the Bay of Biscay, at the mouth og Negro River. Fishing and agriculture has dominated the region for hundreds of years and is their main source of trade.
Trasgu: That's all for now, bye!
